title: Ross Tucker on Mack, Donald holdouts, which NFC teams can't make playoffs (Football 08/02)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ross Tucker to break down the latest news and notes around the NFL and to preview the 2018 NFL season. The guys take a look at the current holdouts and examine which one is more dangerous for the team, Khalil Mack or Aaron Donald. They break down the recent tackle money handed out to guys like Taylor Lewan and Jake Matthews, then they debate who they would rather have between Kirk Cousins, Alex Smith and Patrick Mahomes for 2018. They also pick a group of five NFC teams who will NOT make the playoffs and play a game of fill in the blank.
